replyContent: The algorithm uses anonymous data based on Bluetooth signal strength to make calculations about risk. This is based on the physical distance between app users and how much time they have spent near each other. Bluetooth signal strength is reduced through walls, therefore less likely to satisfy the necessary criteria. Please follow the apps advice.

Bluetooth signal strength is reduced through walls and therefore less likely to satisfy the necessary criteria.
